column4: i need to know where to find that application adept? that acts like apt get installer for apps
well if i need to check the packages available for download where can i do that?
open Applications -> Add/Remove... and in one of the menus you will find something relating to repositories, enable the "universe" repository
after that you should be able to find tvtime in the graphical program <3
what do you mean i get a list of related topics like internet office other etc etc and no menu
found it its in synaptic not in add remove
sorry, i'm not completely sure off the top of my head, i'm using kubuntu at the minute :)
